file_content.text: I yield! I yield to you! Damn Ulldin for leaving me to face you alone!
The result would have been the same.
It wouldn't have mattered.
You can't count on anyone who follows the Jedi Code.
The Jedi will always fail you.
You are right. It's infuriating.
Your strength is undeniable. Is there such power in the dark side?
Denounce the Jedi. The darkness is your only path to inner peace.
It can all be yours.
I leave you to ponder your future.
Your eyes are finally open.
Ignorance is no excuse. Die!
A fatal error. [Kill Zylixx]
You should hunt him down and destroy him for his cowardice.
Make him pay.
No... Ulldin is my fellow. I can't... turn against the Jedi.
Such weakness. I am forced to destroy you.
Then you die. [Kill Zylixx]
After this, you'll find no place among them. You're an outcast.
They've turned against you.
I am left... with nothing. I can't succumb to darkness, nor return to the light. What will become of me?
The dark side will always welcome you. Remember that.
Someday you'll fall.
I leave you to your pitiable existence.
Wallow in it.
I am a broken man.
You don't deserve to live!
Sickening. [Kill Zylixx]
Yaaaaaa!
Someday you'll realize that only the dark side can serve you.
You'll come around.
I'll... I'll consider what I've seen here. You leave me with much to ponder.
Well, well, we're going to have to thank Nomen Karr after all. The Sith showed.
Stand down, Sith. The Padawan you seek is not here. Master Karr discovered her plan and talked her out of it.
It's not your day. You were expecting one lowly little Padawan to crush, and instead you get us.
Save yourselves some trouble and tell me where she is.
You'll help me find her.
The Sith has a sense of humor. Believe me, Master Karr didn't send us to help you.
I should have known this wasn't going to be easy.
It figures.
Just like a Sith, always looking for a shortcut.
You'll do just fine. I enjoy destroying your kind.
To crush.
Then we have something in common.
I'm Ulldin, this is Zylixx. We are fully trained Jedi Knights, and more than your match. You should submit.
Of course, we have yet to encounter a Sith who had the sense to surrender. You all seem bent on having us destroy you.
Admit it, you'd be disappointed if I gave up.
You want to kill me.
Not at all. We don't go around picking fights.
I wouldn't trust it if the Sith surrendered. I prefer the sureness of death.
I have no quarrel with you. Let's just go our separate ways.
How about I just walk away?
Now, why would we agree to just let you go?
Zylixx, we assumed this Sith would engage, as all others we've faced have. If that's not the case....
No, Ulldin, this Sith will continue to hunt Nomen Karr and his Padawan. We must end the threat for good.
Ha! Keep thinking like that and you'll fall to the dark side before you know it.
You have a Sith attitude.
Shut your mouth.
Zylixx, remain calm. The Sith is just trying to unbalance you. Don't let this get under your skin.
Zylixx knows the truth. I think he wants to fall.
He's already dark.
Liar! I'm not weak like you. We simply meet force with force.
You are my brother. We are the same. Attack and let us see your true colors!
You're Sith, all right.
I won't stand here and be insulted like that.
By that logic, if I don't attack, you cannot attack me.
You're not fooling anyone.
No, you're putting words in my mouth!
You're right, you won't fall to the dark side. You'll be too busy being dead.
Meet death! [Attack]
Of the two of us, it's clear that I am the more serene, the more grounded. The better Jedi.
I demonstrate more balance.
No... you won't goad me like this, Sith. I... I can control my emotions.
Yes, stuff your feelings, deny your true nature, Zylixx. It's a ticking time bomb.
Repression is the Jedi way.
I will be calm when you're dead!
I will not strike first. If you intend to kill me, you will have to succumb to your feelings and lash out.
Become the aggressor.
All I... feel is... fury.
Zylixx, get a hold of yourself--
No! No more talk. You die, Sith!
There will be no meditation here!
No time to wait! [Attack]
Allow my lightsaber to get under your skin!
No more talk. [Attack]
True Jedi don't attack to kill. The light side demands temperance.
That's not the Jedi way.
Who are you to lecture about the light side? The Sith force us to take measures like this.
You, Sith, pose an exception. Your vile attempts to hurt Nomen Karr and Jaesa Willsaam are provocation enough.
You don't know my motivations.
What if I come in peace?
Come on, it doesn't take a genius to know you came here to destroy. Your presence is all the confirmation we need. Right, Ulldin?
You sound desperate to justify yourself.
You're rationalizing.
That's enough out of you. Ulldin, it's time to end this.
No. Zylixx, I... I'm unsure. Master Karr claims this Sith means Jaesa harm, but we have no proof.
Master Karr's word is proof enough. I have no crisis of conscience assuming his assessment is sound.
That's an assumption I cannot make, my friend. I will not engage. I must walk away, and I urge you to do the same.
You may have derailed Ulldin's resolve, Sith, but your luck ends there. I'll take you on myself.
Strike when you're ready.
Attack me.
Big mistake.
Never!
It wasn't my intention to duck a fight!
Good! [Attack]
It was worth a try.
Fine, then we fight. [Attack]
This talk is tiresome. Keep at it, and I'll have to kill you for the principle of it.
I'm growing impatient.
Surrender to me and I'll end your suffering quickly.
You're the ones about to die.
See, just like all the others.
It seems you're right, Zylixx. Prepare yourself. Nomen Karr warned that this Sith is especially brutal.
Let me show how brutal I can be!
Especially with Jedi! [Attack]
The fool engages! Attack!
Gather your wits and strength. I want to defeat you at your best.
Take your time.
Be careful what you wish for!
For once, I agree with Nomen Karr.
And he's right.
We'll be sure to let him know you approved.
